raw_text: Though punctuation is usually entirely ignored in unsupervised parsing re search, Seginer (2007) departs from this in one key aspect: the use of phrasal punctuation? punctuation symbols that often mark phrasal boundaries within asentence
clean_text: Though punctuation is usually entirely ignored in unsupervised parsing research, Seginer (2007) departs from this in one key aspect: the use of phrasal punctuation - punctuation symbols that often mark phrasal boundaries within a sentence.
